profile.name: ThePrimeagen
profile.headline: Transforming Code into Reality as CEO at TheStartup
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a passion for open-source projects and a knack for customizing tools like Neovim. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions while driving innovation.

experience.title: CEO Of TheStartup
description: Led the development and launch of multiple projects, including cockpit and harpoon.
Developed and implemented a custom Neovim configuration for enhanced productivity.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Contributed to the development of cockpit, a cutting-edge project that showcases innovative software engineering.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including harpoon and the-topshelf-project-of-the-century.
Provided expert consulting services to clients across various industries.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of multiple open-source projects, including cockpit.
Participated in community-driven initiatives to improve code quality and adoption.
